sets.name: Twilight's Embrace
sets.bonus_item_5: Increases your healing received by 10%.

sets.name: Torug's Pact
sets.location: Grahtwood (Fisherman's Isle). Stormhaven (Hammerdeath Workshop). Deshaan (Lake Hlaalu Retreat).
sets.bonus_item_5: Decreases weapon enchantment cooldown and increases non Oblivion Damage enchantment potency by 30%.

sets.name: Grand Rejuvenation
sets.bonus_item_2: The initial heal of Grand Healing invigorates you and allies affected for 4 seconds, restoring 100 Magicka and Stamina every 1 second.

sets.name: Nightflame
sets.bonus_item_2: When you heal yourself or an ally, you have a 10% chance to summon a totem for 6 seconds that heals you and your allies within 5 meters for 2903 Health every 1 second. This effect can occur once every 10 seconds.

sets.name: Twilight Remedy
sets.bonus_item_3: Gain Minor Aegis at all times, reducing your damage taken from Dungeon, Trial, and Arena Monsters by 5%.
sets.bonus_item_5: When an ally activates your synergy, they heal themselves for 21758 Health over 10 seconds and gain Minor Force, increasing their Critical Damage by 10%. This effect can occur once every 10 seconds per ally.

sets.name: Infallible Mage
sets.location: Hel Ra Citadel, Aetherian Archive, Sanctum Ophidia
sets.bonus_item_3: Gain Minor Slayer at all times, increasing your damage done to Dungeon, Trial, and Arena Monsters by 5%.
sets.bonus_item_5: Adds 833 Spell Critical, Your Heavy Attacks deal an additional 903 damage. Enemies you damage with fully-charged Heavy Attacks are afflicted with Minor Vulnerability for 10 seconds, increasing their damage taken by 8%.

sets.name: Gossamer
sets.bonus_item_5: When you heal yourself or an ally, you grant them Major Evasion for 2 seconds, reducing damage from area attacks by 25%.

sets.name: Healer's Habit
sets.bonus_item_5: Gain Minor Mending at all times, increasing your healing done by 8%.

sets.name: The Troll King
sets.bonus_item_2: When you heal yourself or an ally, if they are still below 50% Health, their Health Recovery is increased by 1548 for 10 seconds.

sets.name: Way of Martial Knowledge
sets.bonus_item_5: While your Stamina is below 50%, your Light Attacks cause the enemy to take 8% additional damage for 5 seconds. This effect can occur once every 8 seconds.

sets.name: Plague Doctor
sets.bonus_item_5: Adds 3000 Maximum Health

sets.name: Sanctuary
sets.location: The Banished Cells I, The Banished Cells II
sets.bonus_item_5: Increases your healing received by 12% for you and up to 11 group members within 10 meters of you.

sets.name: Hircine's Veneer
sets.bonus_item_5: Reduce the cost of your Stamina abilities by 4% for you and up to 11 other group members within 28 meters of you.

sets.name: Ebon Armory
sets.location: Crypt of Hearts I, Crypt of Hearts II
sets.bonus_item_5: Increases your Max Health by 1000 for you and up to 11 other group members within 28 meters of you.

sets.name: The Worm's Raiment
sets.bonus_item_5: Reduces the cost of your Magicka abilities by 4% for you and up to 11 other group members within 28 meters of you.

sets.name: Spell Power Cure
sets.bonus_item_5: When you heal yourself or an ally that is at 100% Health, you have a 50% chance to give the target Major Courage for 10 seconds which increases their Weapon and Spell Damage by 258.

sets.name: Healing Mage
sets.bonus_item_5: When you use an area of effect heal ability, you reduce the Weapon Damage of all enemies within 10 meters of you by 430 for 3 seconds.

sets.name: Inventor's Guard
sets.bonus_item_3: Gain Minor Aegis at all times, reducing your damage taken from Dungeon, Trial, and Arena Monsters by 5%.
sets.bonus_item_5: When you use an Ultimate ability, you and the closest 2 allies within 28 meters of you gain Major Aegis for 10 seconds, reducing your damage taken from Dungeon, Trial, and Arena Monsters by 15%.

sets.name: Earthgore
sets.bonus_item_2: When you heal yourself or an ally that is under 50% Health, you conjure a pool of quenching blood underneath them, immediately removing all previous enemy placed effects, and healing the lowest Health friendly target in the area for 34500 Health over 6 seconds. This effect can occur once every 35 seconds.

sets.name: Vestment of Olorime
sets.bonus_item_3: Gain Minor Aegis at all times, reducing your damage taken from Dungeon, Trial, and Arena Monsters by 5%.
sets.bonus_item_5: Casting abilities that leave an effect on the ground in combat will create a circle of might for 10 seconds. You and your allies in the circle gain Major Courage for 30 seconds, increasing your Weapon and Spell Damage by 258 for 30 seconds.  This effect can occur once every 10 seconds.

sets.name: Jorvuld's Guidance
sets.bonus_item_5: Increases the duration of all Major buffs, Minor buffs, and damage shields you apply to yourself and allies by 40%.

sets.name: Perfect Vestment of Olorime
sets.bonus_item_3: Gain Minor Aegis at all times, reducing your damage taken from Dungeon, Trial, and Arena Monsters by 5%.
sets.bonus_item_5: Adds 1096 Maximum Magicka, Casting abilities that leave an effect on the ground in combat will create a circle of might for 10 seconds. You and your allies standing in the circle gain Major Courage for 30 seconds, increasing your Weapon and Spell Damage by 258. This effect can occur once every 10 seconds.

sets.name: Perfect Mender's Ward
sets.bonus_item_2: Adds 129 Magicka Recovery, Steadfast Ward applies Major Vitality to your target for 3 seconds, increasing the healing taken on your target by 30%.

sets.name: Symphony of Blades
sets.location: Depths of Malatar, Urgalarg Chief-bane's undaunted chest
sets.bonus_item_2:
When you heal an ally who is under 50% of their primary resource, grant them Meridia's Favor, which restores 2325 Magicka or Stamina every 1 second for 6 seconds. This effect can occur every 18 seconds.  

The resource returned is based off the target's highest maximum resource.

sets.name: Perfected Eye of Nahviintaas
sets.bonus_item_3: Gain Minor Aegis at all times, reducing your damage taken from Dungeon, Trial, and Arena Monsters by 5%.
sets.bonus_item_5: Adds 1096 Maximum Magicka, When an ally activates one of your synergies, you and the ally who activated the synergy get 12% cost reduction for non-Ultimate abilities for 3 seconds. This effect can occur every 6 seconds per target.

sets.name: Hollowfang Thirst
sets.bonus_item_5: Whenever you critically heal or critically damage a target, spawn a ball of Hemoglobin at their location. After 2 seconds the ball explodes, restoring 3000 Magicka and applying Minor Vitality to you and your allies within 6 meters of the ball for 9 seconds, increasing their healing received by 8%. This effect can occur once every 9 seconds.

sets.name: Z'en's Redress
sets.bonus_item_5: Your Light Attacks apply the Touch of Z'en on enemies for 20 seconds. Enemies with the Touch of Z'en take an additional 1% more damage for each damage over time effect you've placed on them, up to 5%. You can only receive the benefit from one Touch of Z'en per enemy

skills.name: Elemental Drain
skills.effect_1:
Send the elements to sap an enemy's defenses and afflict them with Major Breach for 23 seconds, reducing their Spell Resistance by 5280.

Also applies Minor Magickasteal to the enemy for 23 seconds, causing you and your allies to restore 300 Magicka every 1 second when damaging them.
skills.effect_2: Also applies Minor Magickasteal to the enemy.

skills.name: Quick Siphon
skills.effect_1:
Focus your staff's power to apply Minor Lifesteal to an enemy for 30 seconds, healing you and your allies for 600 Health every 1 second when damaging them.

When you or an ally is healed by Minor Lifesteal, they gain Minor Expedition, which increases their Movement Speed by 10% for 4 seconds.
skills.effect_2: Allies who are healed from Minor Lifesteal gain bonus movement speed.

skills.name: Overflowing Altar
skills.effect_1:
Sacrifice your life essence to conjure a fountain of blood to apply Minor Lifesteal to enemies in the area, healing you and your allies for 600 Health every 1 second when damaging them.

Allies in the area can activate the Blood Feast synergy, healing for 65% of their Max Health.
skills.effect_2: The synergy heals allies for more.  Reduces the cost as the ability ranks up.

skills.name: Bone Surge
skills.effect_1: Surround yourself with a whirlwind of bones, gaining a damage shield that absorbs up to 2798 damage for 6 seconds.  This ability scales off your Max Health.An ally near you can activate the Spinal Surge synergy, granting the ally and up to 5 other allies a damage shield that absorbs up to 30% of their Max Health for 6 seconds and Major Vitality, increasing their healing received by 30%.
skills.effect_2: The synergy increases healing received.

skills.name: Energy Orb
skills.effect_1:
Project a globe of regeneration that slowly floats forward, healing for 118 Health every half second to you and nearby allies.

An ally near the globe can activate the Healing Combustion synergy, causing the orb to explode and heal for 882 Health to all friendly targets and restore 3960 Magicka or Stamina to the ally, whichever maximum is higher.
skills.effect_2: The orb heals allies instead of damaging enemies.

skills.name: Aggressive Horn
skills.effect_1:
Sound a war horn to rally your forces, increasing you and your group's Max Magicka and Max Stamina by 10% for 30 seconds.

You and your allies gain Major Force, increasing your Critical Damage by 15% for 10 seconds.
skills.effect_2: You and your allies gain Major Force for a brief period after activation.

skills.name: Cleanse
skills.effect_1:
Cleanse yourself and your group, removing 3 negative effects immediately.  

For every negative effect removed, the target is healed for 5% of their Max Health.
skills.effect_2: If a negative effect is removed, the target is healed

sets.name: Grand Rejuvenation
sets.bonus_item_2: The initial heal of Grand Healing invigorates you and allies affected for 4 seconds, restoring 100 Magicka and Stamina every 1 second.

sets.name: Moondancer
sets.bonus_item_3: Gain Minor Slayer at all times, increasing your damage done to Dungeon, Trial, and Arena Monsters by 5%.
sets.bonus_item_5: When you activate a synergy, you gain a shadow blessing that increases your Spell Damage by 448 or a lunar blessing that increases your Magicka Recovery by 448 for 30 seconds. You can only have one blessing active at a time.

sets.name: Necropotence
sets.bonus_item_5: While you have a pet active, your Max Magicka is increased by 3150.

sets.name: Ilambris
sets.bonus_item_2: When you deal Flame or Shock Damage, you have a 10% chance to summon a meteor shower of that damage type that deals 1240 Damage to all enemies within 4 meters every 1 second for 5 seconds. Each effect can occur once every 8 seconds.

sets.name: Burning Spellweave
sets.location: City of Ash I, City of Ash II
sets.bonus_item_5: When you deal damage with a Flame Damage ability, you have a 15% chance to apply the Burning status effect to the enemy and increase your Spell Damage by 525 for 8 seconds. This effect can occur once every 12 seconds.

sets.name: Master Architect
sets.bonus_item_3: Gain Minor Slayer at all times, increasing your damage done to Dungeon, Trial, and Arena Monsters by 5%.
sets.bonus_item_5: When you use an Ultimate ability, you and the closest 2 allies within 28 meters of you gain Major Slayer for 10 seconds, increasing your damage done to Dungeon, Trial, and Arena Monsters by 15%.

sets.name: Mechanical Acuity
sets.location: Pavillion of Artifice, The Clockwork City
sets.bonus_item_4: Adds 1096 Maximum Stamina, Adds 1096 Maximum Magicka
sets.bonus_item_5: When you deal direct damage, you have a 15% chance to gain unerring mechanical vision for 5 seconds, causing your attacks to always be a Critical Strike. This effect can occur once every 18 seconds.

sets.name: Mantle of Siroria
sets.bonus_item_3: Gain Minor Slayer at all times, increasing your damage done to Dungeon, Trial, and Arena Monsters by 5%.
sets.bonus_item_5: Dealing direct damage with a single target ability creates a ring of fire beneath you for 10 seconds. This effect can occur once every 10 seconds. Standing in the ring grants you a stack of Siroria's Boon for 5 seconds. Each stack increases your Spell Damage by 30. 20 stacks max.

sets.name: Zaan
sets.location: Scalecaller Peak,  Urgarlag Chief-bane's undaunted chest
sets.bonus_item_2: When you damage a nearby enemy with a Light or Heavy Attack, you have a 20% chance to create a beam of fire that will connect you to your enemy. The beam deals 3440 Flame damage every 1 second to your enemy for 5 seconds. Every second, this damage increases by 50%. The beam is broken if the enemy moves 8 meters away from you. This effect can occur every 18 seconds.

sets.name: Spell Strategist
sets.bonus_item_5: When you deal damage with a Light Attack, you place a mark over your target for 5 seconds, granting you 500 Spell Damage against your marked target. This effect can occur every 4 seconds.

skills.effect_1:

skills.effect_2: Also applies Minor Magickasteal to the enemy.

sets.name: Night's Silence
sets.bonus_item_5: Ignore the Movement Speed penalty of Sneak.

sets.name: Night's Silence
sets.bonus_item_5: Ignore the Movement Speed penalty of Sneak.

sets.name: Death's Wind
sets.bonus_item_5: When you take melee damage while you are under 35% Health, you knockback and stun all enemies within 8 meters of you for 4 seconds. This effect can occur once every 30 seconds.
